  3/** @file    complex.hpp
  4    @author  Jules Bergmann
  5    @date    2005-03-17
  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: [complex] complex numbers.
  7
  8    This file (via complex-decl and math) declares of vsip::complex
  9    (which is a synonym for std::complex) and related functions as
 10    specified in the [complex] section of the VSIPL++ specifiction.
 11
 12    vsip::complex declaration and functions not explicitly specified
 13    in [math.fns.elementwise] are declared in vsip/core/complex_decl.hpp.
 14
 15    Functions from [math.fns.elementwise] are covered in
 16    vsip/core/fns_elementwise.hpp, which is included from vsip/math.hpp.
 17*/
 18

 33/***********************************************************************
 34  Definitions - Conversion [complex.convert]
 35***********************************************************************/
 36
 37namespace vsip
 38{
 39
 40/// Convert from rectangular to polar for single complex value.
 41
 42/// recttopolar -- convert complex number in rectangular coordinates
 43///                (real and imaginary) into polar coordinates (magnitude
 44///                and phase.
 45
 46template <typename T1,
 47	  typename T2>
 48inline void
 49recttopolar(
 50  complex<T1> const& rect,
 51  T2&                mag,
 52  T2&                phase)
 53  VSIP_NOTHROW
 54{
 55  mag   = abs(rect);
 56  phase = arg(rect);
 57}
 58
 59
 60
 61/// Convert from rectangular to polar for view of complex values.
 62
 63template <typename                            T1,
 64	  typename                            T2,
 65	  template <typename, typename> class const_View,
 66	  template <typename, typename> class View,
 67	  typename                            Block0,
 68	  typename                            Block1,
 69	  typename                            Block2>
 70inline void
 71recttopolar(const_View<complex<T1>, Block0> z,
 72	    View<T2, Block1> rho, View<T2, Block2> theta)
 73  VSIP_NOTHROW
 74{
 75  assert(z.size() == rho.size() && z.size() == theta.size());
 76  for (index_type i = 0; i < z.size(); i++)
 77  {
 78    // Use abs/arg instead of calling scalar recttopolar because that
 79    // would require lvalue_proxy for split-storage.
 80    complex<T1> tmp = z.get(i);
 81    rho.put(i,   abs(tmp));
 82    theta.put(i, arg(tmp));
 83  }
 84}
 85
 86namespace impl
 87{
 88template <typename T>
 89struct realtocomplex_functor
 90{
 91  typedef complex<T> result_type;
 92  static char const* name() { return "realtocomplex"; }
 93  static result_type apply(T rho) { return complex<T>(rho);}
 94  result_type operator() (T rho) const { return apply(rho);}
 95};
 96
 97template <typename T1, typename T2>
 98struct polartorect_functor
 99{
100  typedef typename Promotion<complex<T1>, complex<T2> >::type result_type;
101  static char const* name() { return "polartorect"; }
102  static result_type apply(T1 rho, T2 theta) { return polar(rho, theta);}
103  result_type operator() (T1 rho, T2 theta) const { return apply(rho, theta);}
104};
105
106template <typename T1, typename T2>
107struct Dispatch_polartorect :
108  ITE_Type<Is_view_type<T1>::value || Is_view_type<T2>::value,
109	   As_type<Binary_func_view<polartorect_functor, T1, T2> >,
110	   As_type<polartorect_functor<T1, T2> > >::type
111{
112};
113
114template <typename T1, typename T2>
115struct cmplx_functor
116{
117  typedef typename Promotion<complex<T1>, complex<T2> >::type result_type;
118  static char const* name() { return "cmplx"; }
119  static result_type apply(T1 real, T2 imag) { return result_type(real, imag);}
120  result_type operator() (T1 real, T2 imag) const { return apply(real, imag);}
121};
122
123} // namespace impl
124
125template <typename T>
126inline complex<T>
127polartorect(T rho) VSIP_NOTHROW { return complex<T>(rho);}
128
129template <typename                            T,
130	  template <typename, typename> class const_View,
131	  typename                            Block0>
132inline const_View<complex<T>, 
133                  impl::Unary_func_view<impl::realtocomplex_functor, T> >
134polartorect(const_View<T, Block0> rho) VSIP_NOTHROW
135{
136  return impl::Unary_func_view<impl::realtocomplex_functor, T>::apply(rho);
137}
138
139template <typename T1, typename T2>
140inline typename impl::Dispatch_polartorect<T1, T2>::result_type
141polartorect(T1 rho, T2 theta) VSIP_NOTHROW
142{
143  return impl::Dispatch_polartorect<T1, T2>::apply(rho, theta);
144}
145
146template <typename T1, typename T2,
147	  template <typename, typename> class Const_view,
148	  typename Block1, typename Block2>
149inline typename 
150impl::Binary_func_view<impl::cmplx_functor, 
151		       Const_view<T1, Block1>,
152		       Const_view<T2, Block2> >::result_type
153cmplx(Const_view<T1, Block1> real, Const_view<T2, Block2> imag) VSIP_NOTHROW
154{
155  return impl::Binary_func_view<impl::cmplx_functor,
156    Const_view<T1, Block1>,
157    Const_view<T2, Block2> >::apply(real, imag);
158}
159
160} // namespace vsip
